subject: Boxing
lead_paragraph: Freddie Roach, the trainer for Manny Pacquiao, said he believed Floyd Mayweather Jr. could be preparing for a long-awaited bout with Pacquiao by returning to the ring in September against Victor Ortiz.
snippet: Freddie Roach, the trainer for Manny Pacquiao, said he believed Floyd Mayweather Jr. could be preparing for a long-awaited bout with Pacquiao by returning to the ring in September against Victor Ortiz.
